price: Turn to Him [in repentance] and fear Him, and establish prayer, and do not be among those who associate partners with Allah,
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
